text:
vIqraH Saqtama#nyuqrindra#H | 
duqScyaqvaqnaH pRu#tanAqShADa# yuqddhyO$-smAkaq(gm)q sEnA# avatuq pra yuqthsu || 
indra# AsAM-nEqtA bRuhaqspatiq rdakShi#NA yaqj~jaH puqra E#tuq sOma#H | 
dEqvaqsEqnAnA#-maBiBa~jjatIqnAM jaya#ntInAM maqrutO# yaqntvagrE$ || 
indra#syaq vRuShNOq varu#Nasyaq rAj~ja# AdiqtyAnA$M maqrutAq(gm)q Sarddha# uqgraM | 
maqhAma#nasAM BuvanacyaqvAnAMq GOShO# dEqvAnAMq jaya#tAq muda#sthAt || 
aqsmAkaq-mindraqH samRu#tEShu dhvaqjEShvaqsmAkaMq ~MyA iSha#vaqstA ja#yantu | 18
